00011         PROXY_ADDRESS_STATE_ACTIVE,
00012         PROXY_ADDRESS_STATE_DISABLED,
00013 } proxy_address_state_t;
00014

00018 
00019         buffer *name; /* a inet_ntoa() prepresentation of the address */

00023
